mapper.select: select b.warehouse_name,f.brand_name,e.series_name,d.product_name, c.user_name,a.create_time,COUNT( DISTINCT a.box_no ) AS boxCount from l_ser_warehouse_goods_info a left join t_ser_warehouse_info b on a.warehouse_id = b.id left join t_sys_user_info c on a.user_id = c.id left join t_ser_brand_series_product_info d on a.product_id = d.id left join t_ser_brand_series_info e on e.id = d.series_id left join t_ser_brand_info f on e.brand_id = f.id group by b.warehouse_name,f.brand_name,e.series_name,d.product_name,c.user_name,a.create_time limit #{page},#{limit}
select count(DISTINCT a.box_no) from l_ser_warehouse_goods_info a where a.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId}

select a.product_id,e.brand_name,d.series_name,c.product_name,b.warehouse_name from l_ser_warehouse_goods_info a left join t_ser_warehouse_info b on a.warehouse_id = b.id left join t_ser_brand_series_product_info c on a.product_id = c.id left join t_ser_brand_series_info d on c.series_id = d.id left join t_ser_brand_info e on d.brand_id = e.id where c.product_name = #{productName} GROUP BY a.product_id,e.brand_name,d.series_name,c.product_name,b.warehouse_name
